line.text: Beshrew that heart that makes my heart to groan
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: For that deep wound it gives my friend and me
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Ist not enough to torture me alone
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But slave to slavery my sweet friend must be
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Me from my self thy cruel eye hath taken
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And my next self thou harder hast engrossed
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Of him my self and thee I am forsaken
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: A torment thrice three-fold thus to be crossed
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Prison my heart in thy steel bosom ward
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But then my friend heart let my poor heart bail
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Whoeer keeps me let my heart be his guard
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Thou canst not then use rigour in my gaol
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And yet thou wilt for I being pent in thee
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Perforce am thine and all that is in me
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
